name: Prima Doll: Kouto Tantei
storyline: Due to Ouka's rampage, the battlefield is dominated by mechanical dolls. There was a nameless imperial soldier who secretly infiltrated the city for a certain purpose. In a city where there are no living beings, he meets a support doll Houkiboshi that miraculously survived the outbreak. The two will try to escape this hell hand in hand.
summary: Prima Doll: Kouto Tantei is the second volume of the kinetic novel series based on the multimedia project Prima Doll, being a prequel to the events of the anime, focused on the character Houkiboshi.
